Package edu.sjsu.cs151.spaceinvader.view

Class MoveableImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.sjsu.cs151.spaceinvader.view.MoveableImage
  • public class MoveableImage
extends java.lang.Object
    Customized image class that contains an explosion image to be used by the game pieces as well as flags, draw, and set/get for positioning.
